description:
Lina and others challenge the Dark Lord, Shabranigoodoo. Unfortunately, he`s is too powerful and no magic works on him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jackpot ! Coup de poker de la dernière chance !
Jackpot! Noru ka Soru ka no Oobakuchi!
Jackpot! The Great Life or Death Gamble!
Jackpot! のるかそるかの大バクチ!
